content: stay toasty in the comfort of this chunky crochet hat stitched in bernat softee chunky this beginner hat lets you flex your skills in single_crochet in back loop only chain stitch sewing and pompom techniques play around with any combination of colors to make this hat your own the yarn is available in a wide range of colors so let your creativity flow materials bernat® softee chunky™ 3 5 oz/100 g 108 yds/99 m sizes to fit adult head sizes small large finished circumference 20 21 1 ⁄2 51 54 5 cm
